early: The year has started moving. It will not slow down.
This still feels manageable. That will pass.
Plenty of time remains. This belief is temporary.
The calendar is optimistic at the beginning.
Nothing irreversible has happened yet.
This is the calm part people misremember later.
The year is young. That advantage is already shrinking.
Momentum has begun forming without your input.
You are still allowed to believe this can be shaped.
The countdown started quietly.
The early days always feel less expensive.
Time is generous at first. This does not last.
This phase encourages unrealistic confidence.
You have not yet felt the weight of accumulation.
The year has not asked much of you yet.
Everything still appears adjustable.
There is room for optimism here. It will close.
The calendar has not begun applying pressure.
You are still ahead of consequences.
The illusion of control is strongest now.
mid: You are past the point where plans feel flexible.
This year is no longer forgiving.
Momentum now favors time.
You are improvising more than you admit.
Most intentions have entered maintenance mode.
The margin for correction is thinner now.
This no longer feels like the beginning.
The calendar has stopped waiting.
You are spending more time reacting than choosing.
The year is settling into memory.
This is where time becomes expensive.
The year now expects follow-through.
Flexibility has been replaced by logistics.
You are managing outcomes rather than shaping them.
The calendar has developed expectations.
This phase rewards decisiveness you may not have.
Some options have quietly expired.
The cost of delay has increased.
Time is less patient now.
You are carrying earlier decisions forward.
late: Most of this year already exists only as memory.
There is not enough time left to do this carefully.
What remains is compressed.
You are negotiating with the calendar now.
The ending is visible from here.
The remaining days are not generous.
Soon this becomes historical rather than current.
The year has stopped pretending to be open-ended.
Time is collecting what it is owed.
This phase does not last long.
The calendar has become assertive.
What remains must be prioritized aggressively.
There is little room for revision now.
This is no longer a planning phase.
Time has shifted into extraction mode.
You are working within constraints you did not choose.
Completion has replaced exploration.
The year is narrowing toward its conclusion.
Unfinished ideas are becoming permanent.
The end is no longer abstract.
final: This year is finished. Nothing else fits here.
The year has closed. No amendments allowed.
Everything unfinished belongs to the past now.
This year will not change again.
This timeline is no longer editable.
The year has ended without commentary.
This year has reached a fixed state.
No additional input will be accepted.
The year has entered archival status.

normal: The sky remains indifferent.
The atmosphere continues without concern.
This will not improve your plans.
Conditions exist. Meaning is optional.
The weather will happen regardless.
Nature is not responding to feedback.
This forecast is informational only.
The sky has selected a state.
Expect no assistance from this.
This will pass without apology.
The atmosphere has made its decision.
The sky is not collaborating today.
Weather is present. Interpretation is optional.
The environment remains unsympathetic.
These conditions are not personal.
The sky is proceeding as scheduled.
No accommodation is being made.
The atmosphere is indifferent to outcomes.
This forecast does not imply comfort.
The weather has no stake in this.
error: No forecast. The day will happen anyway.
The sky did not return our call.
No data was provided. Proceed anyway.
The sky remains unavailable for comment.

feels_like: This is how it feels. Accuracy is irrelevant.
Your body disagrees with the number.
This sensation was not accounted for.
Your experience may vary. It usually does.
Your body has its own interpretation.
This is not the temperature you wanted.
daylight: This is all the daylight you get.
These hours will not be extended.
Light is operating on a schedule.
The day has a fixed allowance.
daylight_error: Daylight data missing. Night remains inevitable.
No daylight figures available. Sunset still guaranteed.
Daylight could not be quantified today.
